entry.title: React & Redux Tutorial (Including Testing!)
entry.content:
This article by Tero Parviainen (@teropa) is one of the best full-stack Redux & React examples I’ve come across lately, covering the server-side, thinking about application state, socket.io, and testing react components.

Well worth the read.

entry.title: Survive.js
entry.content: Survive.js is a fantastic book on React and Webpack. It’s an open source ebook and is still under development but I’ve found quite a few things I didn’t know and could immediately apply to my current React+Webpack projects. Webpack is an amazing tool but it has a steep learning curve (and the documentation is lacking) so I wish I had this months ago!
